source.faf944cb:
a = df1.drop_duplicates(subset="name").nlargest(10,"num_following").iloc[:,[1,-3]].reset_index(drop=True) 
fig = px.bar(a,x="name",y="num_following",color="num_following",height=500,title="Top 10 highest number of following and their respective user names")
fig.show()

fig.show()
